sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The ORBit package contains libIDL, libIIOP, libORBit, libORBitCosNaming and libORBitutil libraries.

sect3.title: libIDL
sect3.para: libIDL library is the Interface Definition Language mappings for CORBA.

sect3.title: libIIOP
sect3.para: libIIOP library is for low level CORBA communications.

sect3.title: libORBit
sect3.para: libORBit library is the CORBA API.

sect3.title: libORBitutil
sect3.para: libORBitutil library contain the convenience routines for ORBit.
